page.description: The URL Control opens your browser to the selected page. One or more URL Select controls may appear inside the Format section of a UI_DLG_BOX() or UI_MODELESS_DLG_BOX() function.

argument.name: Url
argument.description: Character. The variable containing the address of the target page.

argument.name: Width
argument.description: Numeric. The width of the control.

section.note: You must not have any space characters in the finished command.

section.title: Example
